publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2424 Stewart Stevenson:The Fight Against Email Spamâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the anti-spam alliance of 13 countries across the European Union and urges other countries to join them in the exchange of appropriate information as part of the fight to identify and close down sources of unsolicited marketing emails, many of which would, if seen by children, have the potential to corrupt and deprave. Supported by: Dr Jean Turner*, Helen Eadie*, John Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*, Richard Lochhead*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Jim Mather*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Alex Fergusson*, Bristow Muldoon*, Robin Harper*
S2M-2424 The Fight Against Email Spam (lodged on 11 February 2005) Margaret Smith*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fiona Hyslop*, Cathie Craigie*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-2424 The Fight Against Email Spam (lodged on 11 February 2005) Bill Aitken*
S2M-2424 The Fight Against Email Spam (lodged on 11 February 2005) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-2424 The Fight Against Email Spam (lodged on 11 February 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2424 The Fight Against Email Spam (lodged on 11 February 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2424 The Fight Against Email Spam (lodged on 11 February 2005) Alex Neil*
